alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:42PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Gusty winds, blowing dust and fire weather concerns Thursday through Saturday... An upper-level low will bring impacts across the region through the weekend. Out ahead of the low, temperatures will warm and winds will increase. This will lead to elevated fire weather conditions Thursday through Saturday. In addition, blowing dust is likely at times and could significantly reduce visibility. Winds look to be quite strong on Friday, and a High Wind Watch is in effect. For Sunday, cooler temps and lighter winds expected, along with a chance for some showers. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
